text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

AggregationMode

How resource references can be aggregated

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/resource-aggregation-mode

LvlCodeDefinition
1contained The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.
1referenced The reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
2  bundled The resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.

name: AggregationMode
description: How resource references can be aggregated

concept.definition: The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.
The reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
The resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.
